text: Ẹ̀yin tí ẹ gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, dájúdájú Allāhu yóò fi kiní kan dan yín wò níbi ẹran-ìgbẹ́ tí ọwọ́ yín àti ọ̀kọ̀ yín bà (nínú aṣọ hurumi) nítorí kí Allāhu lè ṣàfi hàn ẹni t’ó ń páyà Rẹ̀ ní ìkọ̀kọ̀.
